CREATE_SCRIPT_SUBTITLE: To create this script you need to complete the fields below, This information will depend on the type of operating system and the shell that will run it:
EDIT_SCRIPT_SUBTITLE: To edit this script you need to complete the fields below, This information will depend on the type of operating system and the shell that will run it:
MALFORMED_SCRIPT: The script cannot be empty and verify that the parameters are contained within the {{ }} values.
SCRIPT_NAME_HELP: Please fill this field with a simple and easy to remember identifier
SCRIPT_TAGS_HELP: You can associate up to 10 tags for easy search and use.
SCRIPT_DESCRIPTION_HELP: Simple and brief description of what the script does or executes
SCRIPT_SHELL_HELP: The Shell type will be associated with the Host operating system.
SCRIPT_HELP: You can add dynamic parameters to your script using the format {{parameter}}. Please, check out the documentation.
DETECTED_PARAMETERS_one: {{count}} dynamic parameter has been detected. This value will be required before execution
DETECTED_PARAMETERS_other: {{count}} dynamic parameters have been detected. These values will be required before execution
